attributes.action: Force local councils to disclose to the general public the reasons why minor roads are painted with double or single yellow lines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many local councils have painted double yellow lines in front of small retail shops forcing them to go out of business is it because the larger retailers such as Tesco or Asda have local councilors in their pockets or is there a plausable explination. Lets face it some local councils have gone too far please force local authorities to account for their big brother actions
